parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To say (speak) truth, do truth, maintain truth (the truth). From alethes; to be true.
